comps.name: vert_bin_substitution
comps.desc: Substitute datasets' value by bin substitution rules.

inputs.name: input_data
inputs.desc: Vertical partitioning dataset to be substituted.

comps.name: vert_binning
comps.desc: Generate equal frequency or equal range binning rules for vertical partitioning datasets.

attrs.name: binning_method
attrs.desc: How to bin features with numeric types: "quantile"(equal frequency)/"eq_range"(equal range)

attrs.name: bin_num
attrs.desc: Max bin counts for one features.

attrs.name: feature_selects
attrs.desc: which features should be binned.

comps.name: vert_woe_binning
comps.desc: Generate Weight of Evidence (WOE) binning rules for vertical partitioning datasets.

attrs.name: secure_device_type
attrs.desc: Use SPU(Secure multi-party computation or MPC) or HEU(Homomorphic encryption or HE) to secure bucket summation.

attrs.name: binning_method
attrs.desc: How to bin features with numeric types: "quantile"(equal frequency)/"chimerge"(ChiMerge from AAAI92-019: https://www.aaai.org/Papers/AAAI/1992/AAAI92-019.pdf)

attrs.name: bin_num
attrs.desc: Max bin counts for one features.

attrs.name: positive_label
attrs.desc: Which value represent positive value in label.

attrs.name: chimerge_init_bins
attrs.desc: Max bin counts for initialization binning in ChiMerge.

attrs.name: chimerge_target_bins
attrs.desc: Stop merging if remaining bin counts is less than or equal to this value.

attrs.name: chimerge_target_pvalue
attrs.desc: Stop merging if biggest pvalue of remaining bins is greater than this value.

attrs.name: feature_selects
attrs.desc: which features should be binned.

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label of input data.

comps.name: biclassification_eval
comps.desc:
Statistics evaluation for a bi-classification model on a dataset.
1. summary_report: SummaryReport
2. group_reports: List[GroupReport]
3. eq_frequent_bin_report: List[EqBinReport]
4. eq_range_bin_report: List[EqBinReport]
5. head_report: List[PrReport]
reports for fpr = 0.001, 0.005, 0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.2

attrs.name: bucket_size
attrs.desc: Number of buckets.

attrs.name: min_item_cnt_per_bucket
attrs.desc: Min item cnt per bucket. If any bucket doesn't meet the requirement, error raises. For security reasons, we require this parameter to be at least 5.

attrs.name: col
attrs.desc: The column name to use in the dataset. If not provided, the label of dataset will be used by default.

attrs.name: col
attrs.desc: The column name to use in the dataset. If not provided, the label of dataset will be used by default.

comps.name: prediction_bias_eval
comps.desc: Calculate prediction bias, ie. average of predictions - average of labels.

attrs.name: bucket_num
attrs.desc: Num of bucket.

attrs.name: min_item_cnt_per_bucket
attrs.desc: Min item cnt per bucket. If any bucket doesn't meet the requirement, error raises. For security reasons, we require this parameter to be at least 2.

attrs.name: bucket_method
attrs.desc: Bucket method.

attrs.name: col
attrs.desc: The column name to use in the dataset. If not provided, the label of dataset will be used by default.

attrs.name: col
attrs.desc: The column name to use in the dataset. If not provided, the label of dataset will be used by default.

comps.name: ss_pvalue
comps.desc:
Calculate P-Value for LR model training on vertical partitioning dataset by using secret sharing.
For large dataset(large than 10w samples & 200 features),
recommend to use [Ring size: 128, Fxp: 40] options for SPU device.

comps.name: sgb_predict
comps.desc: Predict using SGB model.

attrs.name: receiver
attrs.desc: Party of receiver.

attrs.name: pred_name
attrs.desc: Name for prediction column

attrs.name: save_ids
attrs.desc: Whether to save ids columns into output prediction table. If true, input feature_dataset must contain id columns, and receiver party must be id owner.

attrs.name: save_label
attrs.desc: Whether or not to save real label columns into output pred file. If true, input feature_dataset must contain label columns and receiver party must be label owner.

comps.name: ss_glm_predict
comps.desc: Predict using the SSGLM model.

attrs.name: receiver
attrs.desc: Party of receiver.

attrs.name: pred_name
attrs.desc: Column name for predictions.

attrs.name: save_ids
attrs.desc: Whether to save ids columns into output prediction table. If true, input feature_dataset must contain id columns, and receiver party must be id owner.

attrs.name: save_label
attrs.desc: Whether or not to save real label columns into output pred file. If true, input feature_dataset must contain label columns and receiver party must be label owner.

attrs.name: offset_col
attrs.desc: Specify a column to use as the offset

comps.name: ss_sgd_predict
comps.desc: Predict using the SS-SGD model.

attrs.name: batch_size
attrs.desc: The number of training examples utilized in one iteration.

attrs.name: receiver
attrs.desc: Party of receiver.

attrs.name: pred_name
attrs.desc: Column name for predictions.

attrs.name: save_ids
attrs.desc: Whether to save ids columns into output prediction table. If true, input feature_dataset must contain id columns, and receiver party must be id owner.

attrs.name: save_label
attrs.desc: Whether or not to save real label columns into output pred file. If true, input feature_dataset must contain label columns and receiver party must be label owner.

comps.name: ss_xgb_predict
comps.desc: Predict using the SS-XGB model.

attrs.name: receiver
attrs.desc: Party of receiver.

attrs.name: pred_name
attrs.desc: Column name for predictions.

attrs.name: save_ids
attrs.desc: Whether to save ids columns into output prediction table. If true, input feature_dataset must contain id columns, and receiver party must be id owner.

attrs.name: save_label
attrs.desc: Whether or not to save real label columns into output pred file. If true, input feature_dataset must contain label columns and receiver party must be label owner.

comps.name: sgb_train
comps.desc:
Provides both classification and regression tree boosting (also known as GBDT, GBM)
for vertical split dataset setting by using secure boost.
- SGB is short for SecureBoost. Compared to its safer counterpart SS-XGB, SecureBoost focused on protecting label holder.
- Check https://arxiv.org/abs/1901.08755.

attrs.name: num_boost_round
attrs.desc: Number of boosting iterations.

attrs.name: max_depth
attrs.desc: Maximum depth of a tree.

attrs.name: learning_rate
attrs.desc: Step size shrinkage used in update to prevent overfitting.

attrs.name: objective
attrs.desc: Specify the learning objective.

attrs.name: reg_lambda
attrs.desc: L2 regularization term on weights.

attrs.name: gamma
attrs.desc: Greater than 0 means pre-pruning enabled. If gain of a node is less than this value, it would be pruned.

attrs.name: colsample_by_tree
attrs.desc: Subsample ratio of columns when constructing each tree.

attrs.name: sketch_eps
attrs.desc: This roughly translates into O(1 / sketch_eps) number of bins.

attrs.name: base_score
attrs.desc: The initial prediction score of all instances, global bias.

attrs.name: seed
attrs.desc: Pseudorandom number generator seed.

attrs.name: fixed_point_parameter
attrs.desc: Any floating point number encoded by heu, will multiply a scale and take the round, scale = 2 ** fixed_point_parameter. larger value may mean more numerical accuracy, but too large will lead to overflow problem.

attrs.name: first_tree_with_label_holder_feature
attrs.desc: Whether to train the first tree with label holder's own features.

attrs.name: batch_encoding_enabled
attrs.desc: If use batch encoding optimization.

attrs.name: enable_quantization
attrs.desc: Whether enable quantization of g and h.

attrs.name: quantization_scale
attrs.desc: Scale the sum of g to the specified value.

attrs.name: max_leaf
attrs.desc: Maximum leaf of a tree. Only effective if train leaf wise.

attrs.name: rowsample_by_tree
attrs.desc: Row sub sample ratio of the training instances.

attrs.name: enable_goss
attrs.desc: Whether to enable GOSS.

attrs.name: top_rate
attrs.desc: GOSS-specific parameter. The fraction of large gradients to sample.

attrs.name: bottom_rate
attrs.desc: GOSS-specific parameter. The fraction of small gradients to sample.

attrs.name: early_stop_criterion_g_abs_sum
attrs.desc: If sum(abs(g)) is lower than or equal to this threshold, training will stop.

attrs.name: early_stop_criterion_g_abs_sum_change_ratio
attrs.desc: If absolute g sum change ratio is lower than or equal to this threshold, training will stop.

attrs.name: tree_growing_method
attrs.desc: How to grow tree?

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label of train dataset.

comps.name: ss_glm_train
comps.desc:
generalized linear model (GLM) is a flexible generalization of ordinary linear regression.
The GLM generalizes linear regression by allowing the linear model to be related to the response
variable via a link function and by allowing the magnitude of the variance of each measurement to
be a function of its predicted value.

attrs.name: epochs
attrs.desc: The number of complete pass through the training data.

attrs.name: learning_rate
attrs.desc: The step size at each iteration in one iteration.

attrs.name: batch_size
attrs.desc: The number of training examples utilized in one iteration.

attrs.name: link_type
attrs.desc: link function type

attrs.name: label_dist_type
attrs.desc: label distribution type

attrs.name: tweedie_power
attrs.desc: Tweedie distribution power parameter

attrs.name: dist_scale
attrs.desc: A guess value for distribution's scale

attrs.name: eps
attrs.desc: If the change rate of weights is less than this threshold, the model is considered to be converged, and the training stops early. 0 to disable.

attrs.name: iter_start_irls
attrs.desc: run a few rounds of IRLS training as the initialization of w, 0 disable

attrs.name: decay_epoch
attrs.desc: decay learning interval

attrs.name: decay_rate
attrs.desc: decay learning rate

attrs.name: optimizer
attrs.desc: which optimizer to use: IRLS(Iteratively Reweighted Least Squares) or SGD(Stochastic Gradient Descent)

attrs.name: offset_col
attrs.desc: Specify a column to use as the offset

attrs.name: weight_col
attrs.desc: Specify a column to use for the observation weights

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label of train dataset.

comps.name: ss_sgd_train
comps.desc:
Train both linear and logistic regression
linear models for vertical partitioning dataset with mini batch SGD training solver by using secret sharing.
- SS-SGD is short for secret sharing SGD training.

attrs.name: epochs
attrs.desc: The number of complete pass through the training data.

attrs.name: learning_rate
attrs.desc: The step size at each iteration in one iteration.

attrs.name: batch_size
attrs.desc: The number of training examples utilized in one iteration.

attrs.name: sig_type
attrs.desc: Sigmoid approximation type.

attrs.name: reg_type
attrs.desc: Regression type

attrs.name: penalty
attrs.desc: The penalty(aka regularization term) to be used.

attrs.name: l2_norm
attrs.desc: L2 regularization term.

attrs.name: eps
attrs.desc: If the change rate of weights is less than this threshold, the model is considered to be converged, and the training stops early. 0 to disable.

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label of train dataset.

comps.name: ss_xgb_train
comps.desc:
This method provides both classification and regression tree boosting (also known as GBDT, GBM)
for vertical partitioning dataset setting by using secret sharing.
- SS-XGB is short for secret sharing XGB.
- More details: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2005.08479.pdf

attrs.name: num_boost_round
attrs.desc: Number of boosting iterations.

attrs.name: max_depth
attrs.desc: Maximum depth of a tree.

attrs.name: learning_rate
attrs.desc: Step size shrinkage used in updates to prevent overfitting.

attrs.name: objective
attrs.desc: Specify the learning objective.

attrs.name: reg_lambda
attrs.desc: L2 regularization term on weights.

attrs.name: subsample
attrs.desc: Subsample ratio of the training instances.

attrs.name: colsample_by_tree
attrs.desc: Subsample ratio of columns when constructing each tree.

attrs.name: sketch_eps
attrs.desc: This roughly translates into O(1 / sketch_eps) number of bins.

attrs.name: base_score
attrs.desc: The initial prediction score of all instances, global bias.

attrs.name: seed
attrs.desc: Pseudorandom number generator seed.

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label of train dataset.

comps.name: feature_filter
comps.desc: Drop features from the dataset.

attrs.name: drop_features
attrs.desc: Features to drop.

comps.name: psi
comps.desc: PSI between two parties.

attrs.name: protocol
attrs.desc: PSI protocol.

attrs.name: sort
attrs.desc: Sort the output.

attrs.name: bucket_size
attrs.desc: Specify the hash bucket size used in PSI. Larger values consume more memory.

attrs.name: ecdh_curve_type
attrs.desc: Curve type for ECDH PSI.

attrs.name: key
attrs.desc: Column(s) used to join.

attrs.name: key
attrs.desc: Column(s) used to join.

comps.name: train_test_split
comps.desc:
Split datasets into random train and test subsets.
- Please check: https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.model_selection.train_test_split.html

attrs.name: train_size
attrs.desc: Proportion of the dataset to include in the train subset.

attrs.name: test_size
attrs.desc: Proportion of the dataset to include in the test subset.

attrs.name: random_state
attrs.desc: Specify the random seed of the shuffling.

attrs.name: shuffle
attrs.desc: Whether to shuffle the data before splitting.

comps.name: groupby_statistics
comps.desc:
Get a groupby of statistics, like pandas groupby statistics.
Currently only support VDataframe.

attrs.name: agg
attrs.desc: What kind of aggregation statistics we want to do, currently only supports min, max, mean, sum, var, count(number of elements in each group)

attrs.name: max_group_size
attrs.desc: The maximum number of groups allowed

attrs.name: by
attrs.desc: by what columns should we group the values

attrs.name: values
attrs.desc: on which columns should we calculate the statistics

comps.name: ss_pearsonr
comps.desc:
Calculate Pearson's product-moment correlation coefficient for vertical partitioning dataset
by using secret sharing.
- For large dataset(large than 10w samples & 200 features), recommend to use [Ring size: 128, Fxp: 40] options for SPU device.

attrs.name: feature_selects
attrs.desc: Specify which features to calculate correlation coefficient with. If empty, all features will be used

outputs.name: report
outputs.desc: Output Pearson's product-moment correlation coefficient report.

comps.name: ss_vif
comps.desc:
Calculate Variance Inflation Factor(VIF) for vertical partitioning dataset
by using secret sharing.
- For large dataset(large than 10w samples & 200 features), recommend to use [Ring size: 128, Fxp: 40] options for SPU device.

attrs.name: feature_selects
attrs.desc: Specify which features to calculate VIF with. If empty, all features will be used.

comps.name: table_statistics
comps.desc:
Get a table of statistics,
including each column's
1. datatype
2. total_count
3. count
4. count_na
5. min
6. max
7. var
8. std
9. sem
10. skewness
11. kurtosis
12. q1
13. q2
14. q3
15. moment_2
16. moment_3
17. moment_4
18. central_moment_2
19. central_moment_3
20. central_moment_4
21. sum
22. sum_2
23. sum_3
24. sum_4
- moment_2 means E[X^2].
- central_moment_2 means E[(X - mean(X))^2].
- sum_2 means sum(X^2).
